about_the_game:
Wakey Wakey is a Puzzle Platformer with a unique world-bending twist.



Navigate your everchanging bedroom, take control of new household objects, and overcome surprising obstacles to help this sleepy guy get a good night's rest.



It's late at night and you wake up to find yourself laying down on the floor.

Somehow you must have rolled out of bed.

Better walk across your room so you can get some sleep.

Just when you're about to drift off, you open your eyes to find yourself on the floor again,

but something seems... different.


WAKEY WAKEY FEATURES


  • Puzzle Platformer where your main goal is to traverse the world of your bedroom

  • Take control of various objects around your room to aid you in your sleepy journey

  • Encounter surprising, world bending levels, that will make you wonder what's next

  • Complete challenging achievements to unlock fancy new outfits for your sleepy guy

  • Compete on local and global leaderboards and race your friend to complete levels as quickly as possible

  • Discover Nightmare Mode...

  • Try your best to get to the bed and get some rest

name: Wakey Wakey

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K | AMD Ryzen™ 5 5600 6-Core or above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050, RX 560
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard audio
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 series or above
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2070, RX 6600, Arc A750
  • Sound Card: Onboard audio
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A Puzzle-Platformer about a sleepy guy...who just wants to get to Bed.
